title: Chicken and broccoli salad
ingredients: ['700g broccoli florets', '3 cooked skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cubed', '100g chopped walnuts', '6 spring onions, chopped', '225g mayonnaise', '4 tablespoons apple cider vinegar', '50g granulated sugar, or to taste', '50g cooked bacon, chopped up or crumbled']
